```{r data}
energyData <- read.csv(file = "~/Dropbox/Vargo/data/energyTables/energyFile-2015-05-11-23-59-11.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
parcelData <- read.csv(file="~/Dropbox/Vargo/data/energyTables/Assessor_Property_Information.csv")
data <- merge(energyData, parcelData,by.x="parcel",by.y="Parcel")
```
```{r NA}
naIndex <- which(apply(energyData,1,function(x) sum(is.na(x)))!=0)
```

```{r badParcels}
badParcels <- energyData[which(!is.na(energyData$therms.days.1) & is.na(energyData$therms.1)),"parcel"]
as.character(subset(data,parcel %in% badParcels)$Address)
```

```{r head}
head(data[-naIndex,])
```
